CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Areas_of_Coverage__c), NULL, SUBSTITUTE( IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Garbage Room"), "Garbage Room; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Storage"), "Storage; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Kitchen"), "Kitchen; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Bar"), "Bar; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Electrical and Mechanical Room"), "Electrical and Mechanical Room; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Kitchenettes"), "Kitchenettes; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Offices"), "Offices; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Lunch Room"), "Lunch Room; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Manufacturing"), "Manufacturing; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Warehouse"), "Warehouse; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Shipping/Receiving"), "Shipping/Receiving; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Chute Rooms"), "Chute Rooms; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Other"), Areas_of_Coverage_Other__c, NULL) + ".", "; .", NULL))
CustomField.label: Areas of Coverage Summary
